name: Wedding Photography
description: I do all types weddings. We’ve learned the nuances of the different  Wedding ceremonies and the different things to watch out for. We know the camera angles to take and we’ve identified the important wedding events for each of the ceremonies. Being specialists in  Wedding Photography, we will capture every important moment, making both the couple and their families happy with the Wedding Photos, the Wedding Albums, and the overall experience with Lin and Jirsa Photography.

name: Fashion Photography
description: I do fashion photography also.I will show how to pose infront of camera.I have been working with many brands as a professional fashion & commercial photographer since 3 years. My works have appeared in magazines such as BeMan Magazine, Vogue Turkey, Cosmopolitan, Megaplus Magazine, Hello, Dora Magazine, Vogue Italia - Photovogue, Bizim İzmir Magazine.

name: Photojunalism
description: I will be a journal for you.I will take pictures and edit it.I have experience in my country to take journal photo graphhy.
